text: Lawrence Gordon (born March 25, 1936) is an American producer and motion picture executive.The New York Times He is known for producing Predator (1987), Die Hard (1988), Die Hard 2 (1990), Predator 2 (1990), Point Break (1991), Boogie Nights (1997) and Lara Croft: Tomb Raider (2001). Gordon was born in Belzoni, Mississippi. His brother was producer Charles Gordon. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:American movie producers Category:Businesspeople from Mississippi
title: Lawrence Gordon (producer)
